data.eml:eml: An unusual new species of Canthidium (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) from Oaxaca, Mexico

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kohlmann, Bert, Arriaga-Jiménez, Alfonsina, Rös, Matthias (2018): An unusual new species of Canthidium (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) from Oaxaca, Mexico. Zootaxa 4378 (2): 273-278, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.2.7
